text: Blue Islands Limited is an airline of the Channel Islands. Its main office is in Saint Peter Port, Guernsey, and its registered office is in Saint Anne, Alderney."Contact Us ." Blue Islands. Retrieved on 18 September 2009. "Head Office Our head office is in St. Peter Port, Guernsey, which deals with marketing, PR and media relations and trade enquiries." It runs timetabled services from and within the Channel Islands, the Isle of Man, the United Kingdom and Switzerland. Its main base is Jersey Airport. ==References== Category:1999 establishments in Europe Category:Airlines of Europe Category:Organisations based in the Channel Islands
title: Blue Islands
